cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced multiple components and actions — including Dropdowns, Date Pickers, Editors, Numeric, Currency, Buttons, Radios, Checkboxes, Tabs, and more — by adding comprehensive support for live preview functionality.
Enhanced system-level actions such as navigation, validation, variable handling, property updates, loaders, and control visibility to support real-time live preview updates.
Enhanced layout and interactive components like Grid Menu, Footer Tabs, Tabbed Containers, and Switch Groups with improved live preview behavior for better responsiveness.
Fixed an issue in the File Upload component where localization messages were not being added correctly to the JSON file.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in the File Upload component where localization messages were not being added correctly to the JSON file.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced the Table Grid component by integrating code support for live preview functionality.
Enhanced the Text Input component by improving handling of property value changes for better accuracy.
Enhanced the Name component with additional live preview functionality for improved responsiveness.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in the Dropdown component where menu options were not being recreated after a server-side search with no matching results.
Fixed an issue in the Query Builder where number-type dropdowns were not functioning as expected.
Fixed minor UI inconsistencies in the Container component.
Fixed an issue in the Text component where Markdown formatting was not retained after reopening the popup or tray.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where menu options were not recreated on server-side search when no items matched.
Fixed an issue where number-type dropdowns were not functioning as expected.
Fixed a minor UI issue.
Fixed an issue where Markdown text formatting was not retained after reopening a popup or tray.

cards.title: Added
points: Added new File Storage addon integration in the File Upload control.
Added support for SMS Retriever as a new action.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced logic for offline file submission to improve reliability.
Enhanced controls by reducing minimum height to 2 grid units for better layout flexibility.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a minor UI issue in the interface.
Fixed an issue where dropdown search was not functioning as expected.
Fixed minor UI and console errors during file upload.
Fixed an issue in the tabbed container where tab labels were not properly localized.

cards.title: Added
points: Added support for writing PDF and PNG files using Base64-encoded content.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced tag-based filters in table grid by adding support for 'Is' and 'Not Is' operators.
Enhanced table grid with a separate column for 'Group By' and enabled aggregate figures for all columns per group.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the formula in the time picker did not behave correctly across different time zones.
Fixed an issue where the selected theme was not applied to charts after a theme change.
Fixed an issue where column widths in the table grid reset after adding a row post-resize.
Fixed minor UI issue in text controls.
Fixed minor UI issue in container controls.
Fixed an issue where alignment options in the properties section did not display correctly.
Fixed line height value to improve text UI rendering.
Fixed minor UI issues in the icon component.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced image component with support for alt text property.
Enhanced time picker with prefix/suffix and min/max time configurations.
Enhanced header generation in Data Builder to include all available keys.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a minor UI issue in the Container component.
Fixed an issue in Table Grid where 'Add Rows' undo persisted in NEWROWS and white space appeared on scroll for x-small rows.
Fixed an issue in Table Grid where cursor-based pagination was not functioning as expected.
Fixed an issue in Alert control where markdown was not visible when using the description property.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced property UI layout for ProGlove.
Made minor code improvements to file and verification functions (Download File from URL, Read File, Write File, Open File, MPIN Verification).

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a minor UI issue in Text Input control.
Fixed an issue in Detail Select and File Upload where read-only fields remained editable when tab-index was set.
Fixed an issue in Date Range Picker where min/max date with time was not working as expected.
Fixed an issue where Detail View Single Tag was displayed twice.
Fixed an issue in Date Range Picker where data was not resetting when value was cleared.

cards.title: Added
points: Added new control: ProGlove Barcode Scanner for dedicated pro glove devices.
Added new action for Mpin verification.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Alert control by adding markdown support for description and icon picker property.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed various UI issues in Container.
Fixed an issue in Detail View control where conditional formatting was not working as expected.
Fixed an issue in Date control where an error message was incorrectly logged when the data set was empty.

cards.title: Added
points: Added functionality to select enabled LLM provider’s model from dropdown in DronaHQ AI

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Detail View by adding group options property and fixes of date/datetime in column.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in Gallery Card Control by correcting quick filter functionality.
Fixed an issue in the Prefix-Suffix control where it remained visible in preview mode even after being turned off.
Fixed a minor UI issue in Data range Picker, Dropdown, Text Area, and Detail View controls.
Fixed an issue in Dropdown Control where custom dropdown entries appeared blank unless a default option was selected before or after input.
Fixed an issue in Table Grid which had UI glitch in the tray screen where the custom width setting for action columns did not apply correctly.
Fixed an issue in Metric Control where the data binding for values not working properly.
Fixed an issue in Color Picker control where its UI was not displaying correctly in the dark mode.

cards.title: Added
points: Added Start GPS location tracking action.
Added Stop GPS location tracking action.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Date Range Picker control with prefix, suffix and close icon property.
Enhanced page height calculation for Hide control and Show control actions.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Text Area control with spell check, autofill, auto grow height configurations.
Enhanced File Parser by adding key to hide the headers in the data bind section.
Enhanced Chat Control with auto grow when new content is introduced.
Enhanced Numeric control by adding prefix, suffix text and icon, show clear option support.
Enhanced Charts control by adding key for managing git data types.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where renaming data query did not update the data bind section in the control.
Fixed an issue in Select Bar where number as a value was not working as expected.
Fixed minor UI issues in Keyword Box control.
Fixed minor UI issues in Date Range Picker control when it is inside a container.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Charts control by adding minimum and maximum value properties.
Enhanced Radio control and Checkbox control by adding group layout property.
Enhanced JSON Viewer control by adding a recursive expand property and hide root node property.
Enhanced Split button by adding maximum and minimum list height properties.
Enhanced Tabbed Container control by introducing multiple view container support.
Improved Text control by adding markdown text support.
Enhanced Alert control by moving alert type to the top of the content section
Improved Switch Group, Detail Select, Checkbox, Radio, Select Bar controls as it now accepts array strings as data and label key is now optional.
Enhanced JSON Schema Form control by adding auto-generate schema property.
Enhanced Tags by adding data attributes for better external css support.
Enhanced Spacer by updating minimum size to one.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed minor issues in Dropdown control to adjust the label when present, otherwise fallback to showing the value.
Fixed issues in Query Builder where identical rules appeared in both the main group and the subgroups.
Fixed an issue in Textarea control where on pasting data in control was not working as expected in mac.
Fixed an issue where type conversion was required due to a string being compared with a number.
Fixed a minor CSS issue in Numeric, Phone and Text Input controls for barcode support.
Fixed a minor issue where tabs were not being truncated correctly in the builder.
Fixed an issue in Tabbed Container which now accepts and displays data when provided, even in string format in default view.
Fixed an issue in Compact card, Calendar, Detail View, Sortable and Kanban controls where renaming data query did not update the data bind section in the control.
Fixed an issue in Select and Dropdown control where resetting the control was not working as expected.
Fixed a minor UI issue in Color Picker control.
Fixed a minor UI issue in Phone control.

cards.title: Added
points: Added new Scanner control for scanning barcodes in web and preview
Added new Video Record control for recording videos.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Improved File Parser control by introducing maximum file size property.
Enhanced Text Input, Barcode, Phone and Currency control by adding barcode scan option in web and preview
Enhanced Numeric control by adding barcode scan option, empty value dropdown , pad decimal property and non value in thousand separator.
Enhanced Audio Record and Speech Recognition controls by removing data part from the controls.
Enhanced Playsound control by adding a new property to play sound in mobile devices.
Enhanced JSON Schema Form control by introducing auto generate schema from json.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Color Picker control with prefix, suffix text and icon, show clear option, and color format support.
Enhanced JSON Schema From by adding support for signature in the control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in Text Input control where error was not getting cleared on data change.

cards.title: Removed
points: Removed Button 3 control.

cards.title: Added
points: Added extra new properties for advanced editor in LIST REPEAT.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Added indeterminate and hide value label properties in PROGRESS BAR.
Added indeterminate and hide value label properties in CIRCULAR PROGRESS BAR.
Enhanced LINK with prefix/suffix icons, allow wrapping, underline type, and underline style properties.
Enhanced RANGE PICKER with show end value and display value properties.
Added default formula binding section and new default formula in CHECKBOX TREE.
Reduced default width of control in CONTAINER.
Added a progress bar in TIMELINE to indicate timeline status.
Enhanced PHONE with prefix/suffix text and icon, show clear, and lock selected country properties.
Added function in BINDAPI to compare on-prem version for better control on execution.
Enhanced TABLE GRID with configurable custom actions column, configurable search bar minimum width, turn off row selections option, and configurable header visibility.
Added info for sample file in FILE UPLOAD.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in FILE UPLOAD where resetting control for only one allowed file still showed a limit exceeded error for the new file.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced override dynamic variables functionality in TriggerDataQuery for improved usability.
Enhanced table grid with resizable columns, header color sync for grouped data, and fixed select/deselect functionality.

Changed bind data nomenclature across various components: CHECKBOX, DROPDOWN, SELECTBAR, IMAGE SELECT, TAGS, TAG, KEYWORD BOX, TABS, NAVBAR, CHECKBOX TREE, TABBED CONTAINER, PREFIX SUFFIX, RANGE PICKER, PHONE, SELECT, TEXT.
Enabled vertical resizing of control in HORIZONTAL STEPS.
Optimized browser memory usage across multiple controls: ADDRESS, GPS, DATE TIME, TIME, MULTI IMAGE, CHAT, DATE, FILE UPLOAD, COLOR PICKER, SPARKLINE, COMPACT CARD, TOGGLE.
Minor enhancement in BUTTON to maintain button state.
Added 'View Format' property in DATE RANGE PICKER for compact UI usage.
Introduced multiple features in TEXT INPUT: prefix/suffix text & icons, clear button, browser autofill, capitalization, spell check, regex pattern validation with message, and focus styling.
Enhanced BUTTON with prefix/suffix icons and wrap text property.
Limited confetti particles to prevent browser crashes.
Added a toggle in TriggerDataQuery to trigger selected data query dependencies (complete tree).
Enhanced FILE PARSER by adding a new output property 'metainfo'.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed ActionFlow filter object action in FILTER OBJECTS, NAME, PHONE AND ADDRESS.
Added proper function reference in SETVARIABLE for select data query dropdown.
Minor UI fix in CUSTOM CONTROL.
Minor UI fixes in PREFIX SUFFIX and MAP.
Fixed error handling in FILE UPLOAD and improved string handling.
Fixed DATE RANGE PICKER reset behavior to also reset the calendar.
Fixed CALLRESTAPI utility to properly pass headers.
Minor CSS fix in TABBED CONTAINER.

cards.title: Removed
points: Removed REFRESHVARIABLEDATA: use Trigger Data Query instead.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue for column selection in filter in Table Grid.

cards.title: Added
points: Added new GEOLOCATION function to get your desired location in GETLOCATION.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue where GPS control was not showing data.
Fixed an issue on change form data where values were not getting updated in JSON Schema Form.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Renamed bind data nomenclature in Breadcrumbs, Switch Group, Profile Groups, Detail Select, and Split Button.
Minor UI enhancement in Date Range Control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixes deprecation message made dynamic in Compute (VARIABLES) and Message (Create dynamic text).
Fixed HTML view handling in Table Grid Detail View.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where IMAGE control was getting the wrong URL.
Fixed an issue in Table Grid where editing a number-type column converted it to a string; also included minor UI fixes.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Updated JSON Schema Form control library to avoid lagging issues.
Changed default formula in Custom Control for better usability.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where GETLOCALSTORAGE would cause an exception when the value did not exist in local storage.
Fixed minor UI issue in METRIC control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed data escaping issues in Table Grid and resolved filter-related inconsistencies.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced default HTML data provided in the Custom Control.

cards.title: Added
points: Added a new Audio Record control for improved recording functionality.
Added a new Speech Recognition control for enhanced voice input capabilities.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Dropdown control to reset mapping on data change for better adaptability.
Enhanced File Parser with strict checking toggle set to off by default for more flexibility.
Enhanced JSON Schema Form by adding descriptions for properties to improve usability.

cards.title: Added
points: Added a new JSON Schema Form control for improved form handling and flexibility.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Dropdown control to allow empty names for more customization.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed editable data inconsistencies in Table Grid, resolved height-related issues, and addressed localization-related fixes.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the Prefix and Suffix dropdowns were not clickable on iOS devices.
Fixed an issue in Custom Control where error messages were not displaying correctly when using rules and validation.
Fixed an issue in the CallService action where 'Download as file' failure cases were not handled properly.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Changed default formula behavior for the Heading control to improve consistency.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in the CallService action where the action remained in a loading state if the REST API returned an error while 'Download as file' was enabled.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where columns in the property section were incorrectly visible for Breadcrumbs, Switch Group, Profile Group, Select Bar, Split Button, and Detail Select controls.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in the Collapsible Menu where setting data through another control triggered the action repeatedly in an infinite loop.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in download file from URL where blob file download was not working on Safari, headers being passed in network request in web, and automatically detecting the extension of file depending on MIME type.
Fixed issue in download file where blob file download was not working on Safari.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in data builder where string type formula was getting parsed incorrectly.
Fixed issue in chat where pressing enter moved the scrollbar to the top, pointing to the first query.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Increased default height of radio control.
Decreased default height of checkbox control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed minor CSS issue for scrollbar z-index in JSON editor.
Fixed minor UI issue in charts.
Fixed minor UI issue in table grid.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Reduced default width of keyword box control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in callservice where the 'Download as File' option in ActionFlow's server-side actions was not working properly.
Fixed issue in textarea where it can now accept numbers as data.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Reduced default width of quantity control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed minor CSS issue in container control.
Fixed issue in table grid where quick filter was not visible in builder.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Added row height customization feature in table grid, configurable debounce for search, and minor UI fixes.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in HTML control where builder and preview control views were different.
Fixed issue in download file where file extension was getting set as undefined for blob URLs.

cards.title: Added
points: Introduced remove property (readonly/required) action for input controls.
Introduced set property (readonly/required) action for input controls.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Introduced utility for redirecting parent window.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in advanced dropdown where tag was not created when other option toggle was on.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced builder view by adding a scroll bar for better UI experience.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed scroll bar issue in Lottie Player preview.
Fixed an issue where focusout was triggered when pressing the input in iOS.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Markdown Editor by reducing the default grid width.
Enhanced Markdown Viewer by reducing the default grid width.
Enhanced Markdown Viewer by updating the default formula for the control.
Enhanced Text control by updating the default formula for the control.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the border was not getting applied through external CSS in the Container component.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the change event was not triggered on autofill suggestion in Address control.
Fixed an issue where placeholder text in Advanced Dropdown wrapped to the next line despite available space.
Fixed an issue where focusout was triggered when pressing the input in iOS for Prefix Suffix control.
Fixed an issue where popups in focusout event were closing the tray screen unexpectedly for Prefix Suffix control.
Fixed an issue where popups in focusout event were closing the tray screen unexpectedly for Numeric control.
Fixed an issue where popups in focusout event were closing the tray screen unexpectedly for Currency control.
Fixed an issue where popups in focusout event were closing the tray screen unexpectedly for Phone control.
Fixed an issue where popups in focusout event were closing the tray screen unexpectedly for Quantity control.
Fixed an issue where popups in focusout event were closing the tray screen unexpectedly for Text Input control.
Fixed a minor CSS issue where the range border was getting cut in Value Picker control.
Fixed an issue in Advanced Dropdown where the scroll bar was not visible when multiple options were present.
Fixed an image regex-related issue in Table Grid.
Fixed an issue where connector logs' initiator was not working correctly for app open and recurring actions in CallService (Action).

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue where the cursor was misplaced when focused in Rich Text Editor.
Fixed issue where the parent container background image was visible on the child container.
Fixed issue related to filters with data, time, and date-time columns in Table Grid.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced with a minor update for the new property section in BPM Submit.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue related to filters and group data action conditions not working as expected in table grid.
Fixes related to localization in tabbed container.
Fixes related to localization in select bar.
Fixes related to localization in select.
Fixes related to localization in tabs.
Fixed for focus out working as expected in text input.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced properties section of address .
Enhanced with a feature to pass file name dynamically in download file.
Enhanced with a feature to pass file name dynamically in download file from URL.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a UI issue where the close icon does not change on reset in dropdown.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed UI issue for dynamically generated control and added some missing properties in FORM REPEAT.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue where MAX HEIGHT property was not working as expected in IMAGE.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Added tool tip for the tab container.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed console errors for images in the chat component.

cards.title: Enhanced
points: Improved UI for the properties section in Statistics.
Improved UI for the properties section in Alert.
Improved UI for the properties section in Dual Text.
Improved UI for the properties section in Quantity.
Improved UI for the properties section in Dashboard.
Improved UI for the properties section in Label.
Improved UI for the properties section in Embed.
Improved UI for the properties section in Heading.
Improved UI for the properties section in Lottie Player.
Improved UI for the properties section in Metric.
Improved UI for the properties section in Button.
Improved UI for the properties section in BPM Submit.
Improved UI for the properties section in Toggle Theme.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed library initialization issue in Markdown Viewer.
Fixed minor bug related to server-side filtering in TableGrid.
Fixed overlapping tabs issue in Tabbed Container.

cards.title: Deprecated
points: Deprecated the Image Menu Grid.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed _isSelected not working as expected in Table Grid.
Fixed minor UI issue related to code blocks in Markdown Viewer.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed special character handling in file names for the DownloadFileFromURL action.
Fixed special character handling in file names for the WriteFile action.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fix for data being not returned as expected in GETLOCALSTORAGE.

cards.title: Added
points: New action added to perform secure REST API calls on web and mobile devices (SECUREAPICALL).

cards.title: Fixed
points: Minor UI fix regarding textarea property in HTML.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Help text added for easy use in DownloadFileFromURL.
Help text added for easy use in WriteFile.
Removed selected option section in Tabbed container.
Minor issue related to close icon fixed in FILE PARSER.

cards.title: Added
points: New action to turn on and off the flashlight on mobile devices.
New action to get the address from the provided coordinates.
New action to get coordinates from the provided address.
New action to convert text to speech for mobile devices.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: New UI for properties, data, and actions section for all controls.

cards.title: Added
points: New action to open files on mobile devices (OpenFile).
New action to read files on mobile devices (ReadFile).
New action to write files on mobile devices (WriteFile).
New action to download files on both web and mobile devices (DownloadFileFromURL).

cards.title: Added
points: New functions to convert between Blob URL, Base64, and byte array: BLOBURLTOBASE64, BASE64TOBLOBURL, BLOBURLTOBYTEARRAY, BYTEARRAYTOBLOBURL.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Added support for displaying parameter suggestions for multiple actions, including Toast, Confirm, Alert, Email, Call, SMS, Set control value, Refresh control, Show control, Hide control, Set variable, Navigate, Navigate to auth screen, Microapp navigation, Confetti, Show loader (for controls), Stop loader (for controls), Invoke action (triggerAction), Copy to clipboard, Open URL, Play sound, Call REST API, File Parser, DownloadFileAs, TransformDataToArray, TransformDataToObject, Interchange, MergeArrays, Concat, Flattened, Range, ArrayToCSV.

cards.title: Added
points: Date, time, and datetime datatypes added to the Query builder.
'Maintain search text' property introduced in Dropdown.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Image control enhanced with a new default URL link.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Minor UI fix in Tabbed container when opened in Firefox.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Issue where dynamic values were not accepted in min date and max date in Date range picker.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Issue where files could not be uploaded in File upload.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Bug related to file extension reading in File parser.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Minor bug fix for header names and added custom action for column visibility in Table grid.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in Table grid with new property output added as isEditing.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in Image with image_click action added.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Markdown viewer minor bug fix for scrolling.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Detail View minor bug fix for properties output.
Fixed in Table grid minor bug fix for sort and filter, and disabled interaction during loading state.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in Dropdown with 'Select All' feature introduced and 'Clear' option property added.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Collapsible menu localization-related issues.
Fixed in Kanban minor bug fix for search.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Table grid minor bug fix for tag colors.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in File upload minor UI fix in the property section.
Fixed in Tabbed container issue where the output of the selected tab was not visible.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in BindApi now supports download as a file.
Enhanced in VariableApi now supports download as a file.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Table grid UI enhancement for single tag and multi-tag, and issue with table column widths.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced the Default grid configuration changes for dashboard, image select bar, image choice, sortable, compact card, detail select, detail view, query builder, and BPM submit.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in File upload localization-related bug.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Text input edge case when the control is disabled via rules.
Fixed in Detail view header mismatch issue when data is changed dynamically.
Fixed in VALIDATEPAGES issue where validation was not working as expected when the screen ID was changed.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Table grid UI issue for grouped data on the builder.
Fixed in Text input disabled class removed.
Fixed in Navbar options dropdown not opening issue.
Fixed in Select bar issue where the background color was not removed from unselected options.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Detail view edge case issue for package.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Checkbox where typing on the 'Others option' was not possible.
Fixed in Radio where typing on the 'Others option' was not possible.

cards.title: Added
points: Added in UI JSON introduced with value, icon, prefix, and color in the data bind section for Detail Select.

cards.title: Deprecated
points: Deprecated the older Detail Select control.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in Dropdown now supports server-side search, server-side pagination, and tab index.
Enhanced in Prefix and suffix now support the introduction of the classic dropdown.
Enhanced in Split button with color, prefix, and icon keys in the data bind UI JSON.
Enhanced in Select bar with value, color, prefix, and icon keys in the UI JSON data bind section.
Enhanced in Table grid with the introduction of the _isSelected key for selected rows.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in UI JSON introduced in the data section for Switch group.
Enhanced in SetCtrlValue now includes handling for list-type controls.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Table grid number type column not accepting value as 0 when data is empty.
Fixed in Collapsible menu default min-width reduced to prevent excessive space when data has only one option.
Fixed in Terms and conditions in builder, changes not reflecting when data is provided through the data section, along with a minor CSS fix.
Fixed in File upload issues related to localization.
Fixed in Numeric data not showing when 0 is passed from the data section.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Phone UI issue in package.

cards.title: Added
points: Added in SETLOCALSTORAGE action to store data in local storage.
Added in GETLOCALSTORAGE action to retrieve data from local storage.
Added in CLEARLOCALSTORAGE action to clear data from local storage.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in Table grid UI for aggregation footer options.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Kanban UI for filter and quick filters in single tag and multi-tag.
Fixed in Compact card UI for filter and quick filters in single tag and multi-tag.
Fixed in Cascader control not working properly on iOS devices.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Call service (action) now supports download file action in Multistep Auth refresh flow.
Fixed in Table grid UI for filter and quick filters in single tag and multi-tag, and freeze columns UI issue with custom column widths.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced the On Validate Screen Action to focus on the first invalid control when any validation fails.
Enhanced the DetailView Control to include an editable option for selected fields.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed an issue where the Change State Actionblock did not show the states to be set or removed.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced in Calendar UI now supports single tag and multi-tag options.
Enhanced in Sortable UI now supports single tag and multi-tag options.
Enhanced in Kanban UI now supports single tag and multi-tag options.
Enhanced in Compact card (all card controls) UI now supports single tag and multi-tag options.
Enhanced in Table grid UI now supports single tag and multi-tag options, along with UI enhancements for the editable part.
Enhanced in Detail view now allows direct data editing in the control, along with UI enhancements.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Prefix and suffix value not giving output for numeric.

cards.title: Added
points: Added new property to add a border for all tabs when the pill option is selected in Tabbed container.
Added advanced dropdown option in Focus Control action to enable focus.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed in Time Picker action flow triggering on clear option.
Fixed in Tabbed container issue where tabs were getting multiplied on resetControlData action.
Fixed in Query builder issue by adding more static messages for master JSON localization.
Fixed in Advanced dropdown default width size reduced, issue with dropdown visibility in popup and tray resolved.
Fixed in collapsible menu default width size reduction.
Fixed in Menu list default width size reduced.
Fixed in Grouped menu default width size reduced.
Fixed in Default formula for value section added in prefix and suffix.
Fixed in Checkbox minor UI fixes, checkmark not clickable on iOS devices.
Fixed in Radio button minor UI fixes, checkmark not clickable on iOS devices.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed edge case for Enter press event handling.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced on URL to download field now supports dynamic values in download file (action).

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed z-index issue for image preview in detail view in Table grid.

cards.title: Deprecated
points: This action is now deprecated for cloud, soon will be deprecated for on-prem as well in Compute (action).
This action is now deprecated for cloud, soon will be deprecated for on-prem as well in Create Dynamic Text (Action).

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced on Localization support added for aggregation footer in Table grid.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced on Iterate tasks will now be executed sequentially in Iterate task.
Enhanced on support for offline submission added via data queries in BindApi.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced an issue where the enum dropdown did not support the search option in Query Builder.
Enhanced support for localization in Query Builder.
Enhanced dropdown to display operators based on datatype (text/number) in Query Builder.
Enhanced support for passing data as an array of strings and an array of objects in Checkbox and Radio controls.
Enhanced support for passing data as an array of objects with behavior similar to advanced dropdowns in Checkbox and Radio controls.
Enhanced UI for a clearer and more summarized view in Dropdown.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issues related to focus-out behavior in Query Builder.
Fixed output keyword suggestion in Range Picker.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced support to allow passing custom parameters in trigger data queries in CUSTOMJS function.
